title: Handbag, 1927
medium:
Medium: silk and cotton (confirmed by microscopy), copper frame, jadeite cabochon
Technique: plain weave with discontinuous wefts (tapestry)
description: Small flat tapestry-woven handbag with side gussets and cutout copper frame with jadeite cabochons. Each side suggests a landscape with low hills and a large expanse of sky. Colors are sky blue, yellow-green, green, blues, lavenders, yellows, rusts and pinks. Plaited cord of same colors used for straps. Lined with gold pongee.

tombstone.epitaph:
Handbag, 1927.Medium: silk and cotton (confirmed by microscopy), copper frame, jadeite cabochon
Technique: plain weave with discontinuous wefts (tapestry). 1956-84-17.
